repeat.description: ~~Repeats texts sends by a user.~~ **NOT READY**

whoisironman.description: Let you know the true Ironman.

backup.description: Creates a backup of all guilds' options.

reset.description: Resets all current guild's option to default value.

prefix.description: Changes the prefix of the bot.

info.description: Shows information about a user or a server.

history.description: Shows edit history of a message.

purge.description: Purges a number of latest message(s).

movevoice.description: Moves members from voice channels to another channel.

mvregex.description: Same as movevoice but chooses using RegEx.

muteall.description: Mutes all every in all voice channels.

unmuteall.description: Unmutes every members in all voice channels.

disconnectall.description: Disconnects every members from all voice channels.

hook.description: Hooks a text with a voice channel.
usage: hook add .... I AM TOO LAZY TO DO IT NOW K? -.-

askimg.description: Ask information from WolframAlpha as an image.

morse.description: Translates between morse code and English.

play.description: Join the voice channel you are in then play a song.

nowplaying.description: Shows information about the current song.

search.description: Searchs songs on youtube to pick.

join.description: Joins the voice channel you are in.

remove.description: Removes a song from the queue.

move.description: Moves position of a song in the queue.

seek.description: Seeks to a specific point in a song.

rickroll.description: Never gonna give you up. Never gonna let you down.
